sentences.en: a T-shirt with Japanese writing on it
sentences.cn: 一件印有日语的T恤衫

sentences.en: he asked them to put their complaints in writing.
sentences.cn: 他要求他们以书面形式提出投诉。

sentences.en: He could imitate in speech or writing most of those he admired.
sentences.cn: 他能模仿大多数自己崇拜的偶像的讲话和写作风格。

sentences.en: He sat behind a desk laboriously writing with an Army issue pen.
sentences.cn: 他坐在书桌后吃力地写着，用的是一支部队发的钢笔。

sentences.en: His remedial teacher sees signs of progress in his reading and writing.
sentences.cn: 他的辅导教师发现了他在阅读和写作方面进步的迹象。

sentences.en: His sporting and political interests coalesced admirably in his writing about climbing.
sentences.cn: 他在写登山的文章中，把自己对体育和政治的兴趣完美地结合了起来。

sentences.en: His writing benefits from the shade of Lincoln hovering over his shoulder.
sentences.cn: 他的写作得益于他感到已故的林肯一直在他身后激励着他。

sentences.en: I supported us by writing bilge for women's magazines.
sentences.cn: 我胡乱给女性杂志写点东西，维持我们的生计。

sentences.en: In the post-war years her writing regularly appeared in The New Journal.
sentences.cn: 她的文章在战后那几年经常出现在《新日报》上。

sentences.en: It has been very heartening to see new writing emerging.
sentences.cn: 看到新著作问世非常鼓舞人心。

sentences.en: Jill was starting to get some freelance writing jobs from trade magazines.
sentences.cn: 吉尔开始从一些行业杂志接点自由撰稿的活儿。

sentences.en: My hobbies are letter writing, foot-ball, music, photography, and tennis.
sentences.cn: 我的业余爱好是写信、踢足球、听音乐、玩摄影和打网球。

sentences.en: She had begun to be a little bored with novel writing.
sentences.cn: 她开始对写小说有些厌倦了。

sentences.en: She is currently writing a sequel to Daphne du Maurier's "Rebecca"
sentences.cn: 她现在正在续写达夫妮·杜穆里埃的小说《蝴蝶梦》。

sentences.en: She's got too much dignity to descend to writing anonymous letters.
sentences.cn: 她是个自尊心很强的人，绝不会自贬身份去写匿名信。

sentences.en: Some of his most powerful writing is based on his childhood experiences.
sentences.cn: 他的一些最震慑人心的作品是根据儿时经历写成的。

sentences.en: the writing was on the wall for the old system.
sentences.cn: 旧制度的厄运将至。

sentences.en: They had left school at fifteen and were quite untutored in writing.
sentences.cn: 他们15岁就辍学了，几乎未接受过正式的写作训练。

sentences.en: They will concentrate on teaching the basics of reading, writing and arithmetic.
sentences.cn: 他们将集中教授阅读、写作和算术基础知识。

sentences.en: What does the writing on the back say?
sentences.cn: 背面的文字说什么？
